segments.text: Is there a medication you can prescribe to help me with my problem ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are various choices of blood pressure medication that we can try .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We could start with Hydrochlorothiazide , which is a diuretic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There really are not many side effects . You need to drink a lot of water when you take this pill .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that the only medication I need to take ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It might be , but for a while I also want you to take an ACE inhibitor , Lisinopril .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are the side effects of that drug ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You may have a little bit of a dry cough , but you will feel much better .
segments.speaker: S2
